short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for deconstructing digital sales funnels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With unFunnelizer you will be able to reveal any hidden CTA in a sales page.

Simple as that.
